title: Afghanistan v Zimbabwe in UAE 2018 Scoreboard
text: February 16, 2018 / 3:22 PM / Updated 25 minutes ago Afghanistan v Zimbabwe in UAE 2018 Scoreboard Reuters Staff 3   Scoreboard at close of play of 4th odi between Afghanistan and Zimbabwe on Friday at Sharjah, United Arab Emirates Afghanistan win by 10 wickets Zimbabwe 1st innings Solomon Mire b Mujeeb Zadran 9 Hamilton Masakadza b Mujeeb Zadran 4 Tarisai Musakanda c&b Mohammad Nabi 9 Brendan Taylor c Ihsanullah b Sharafuddin Ashraf 30 Craig Ervine Not Out 54 Sikandar Raza lbw Rashid Khan 4 Ryan Burl c&b Mohammad Nabi 10 Graeme Cremer c Ihsanullah b Mujeeb Zadran 2 Kyle Jarvis b Mujeeb Zadran 0 Tendai Chatara c Ihsanullah b Rashid Khan 4 Blessing Muzarabani b Mujeeb Zadran 0 Extras 0b 1lb 0nb 0pen 7w 8 Total (38.0 overs) 134 all out Fall of Wickets : 1-14 Mire, 2-15 Masakadza, 3-54 Musakanda, 4-66 Taylor, 5-74 Butt, 6-88 Burl, 7-98 Cremer, 8-98 Jarvis, 9-103 Chatara, 10-134 Muzarabani Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Dawlat Zadran 7 2 22 0 3.14 Mujeeb Zadran 10 0 50 5 5.00 2w Sharafuddin Ashraf 4 0 15 1 3.75 Mohammad Nabi 7 1 18 2 2.57 Rashid Khan 10 2 28 2 2.80 1w Afghanistan 1st innings Mohammad Shahzad Not Out 75 Ihsanullah Not Out 51 Extras 0b 2lb 0nb 0pen 7w 9 Total (21.1 overs) 135-0 Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Kyle Jarvis 3 0 23 0 7.67 3w Tendai Chatara 4 0 27 0 6.75 Graeme Cremer 8 1 38 0 4.75 1w Blessing Muzarabani 4 0 25 0 6.25 3w Ryan Burl 2.1 0 20 0 9.23 Umpire Ahmed Pakteen Umpire Nigel Llong Video Ahmed Durrani Match Referee Richard Richardson
